snippet: The plane landed on the Major Deegan Expressway around 3:20 p.m. near East 233rd Street, fire officials said, but none of the passengers had life-threatening injuries.
abstract: Single-engine plane on route from Danbury, Conn, on Statue of Liberty tour makes emergency landing on Major Deegan Expressway in Bronx; officials report no serious injuries.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and ASHLEY SOUTHALL
byline.contributor: Corey Kilgannon, Kate Pastor and Michael Schwirtz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The plane landed on the Major Deegan Expressway around 3:20 p.m. near East 233rd Street, fire officials said, but none of the passengers had life-threatening injuries.

headline.main: Small Plane Makes an Emergency Landing on a Highway in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Small Plane Makes an Emergency Landing on a Highway in the Bronx
